name: Simple Pneumothorax
chief_complaint: Sudden sharp chest pain and shortness of breath
physical_findings: decreased breath sounds on affected side

lab_results.CXR: visible pleural line without lung markings

treatment: needle aspiration or chest tube insertion if larger
prognosis: Excellent with proper treatment, typically resolves within 2-4 weeks
description: A small collapse of lung tissue caused by air entering the pleural space, often spontaneous in tall, thin young males
